item.title: 3 Apps To Improve Samsung Galaxy S4 Battery Life
item.description: Improving the Samsung Galaxy S4 Battery Life What follows is a short intro to 3 apps that in my experience have improved my SGS4 battery life – your mileage may vary and I can’t be to blame for any damage caused! That said, I don’t think any of these should render your phone unusable :) CPU Tuner This is the daddy of all battery saving apps, and works best when your phone is rooted.
